response.original_title: A Fourth Reich in the Sun - Hitler’s Escape to Argentina
response.overview: Patrick Henningsen interviews Gerrard Williams, the former Duty Editor at Reuters Television and Foreign Duty Editor at The BBC, Sky News and APTN and author of the book Grey Wolf. Patrick and Gerrard take a deeper look into one of the greatest the untold stories of World War II, where Adolf Hitler and many other top Nazis including Martin Bormann, escaped to Argentina after the Fall of Berlin in 1945.
response.title: A Fourth Reich in the Sun - Hitler’s Escape to Argentina
